definitions.definition: the unit of money of some countries of the European Union

examples.text: I paid five euros for it.
The price is given in euros.
A half-kilo pack of pasta costs around 70 euro cents.

definitions.definition: euros as a system of money; the value of the euro compared with the value of the money of other countries

examples.text: What if the UK had **joined the Euro** in 1999?
the value of the euro against the dollar
